flags.title: From MAKE Magazine
flags.text: This project first appeared on the pages of MAKE magazine.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
pour a little bit of vinager( about 1/8) into the bottle(any type will do if it has a screw on lid.

Then get some paper towel or a tissue( tissues speed up the reaction) and make a line of bicarb soda in it. Fold over the ends and roll it up. get the lid of the bottle ready, place the bicarb into the bottle gently. screw the lid on really quickly and tight, give it a shake and run!( it also works great throwing it up in the air and in holes covered with dirt)
guide.introduction_rendered:
pour a little bit of vinager( about 1/8) into the bottle(any type will do if it has a screw on lid.

Then get some paper towel or a tissue( tissues speed up the reaction) and make a line of bicarb soda in it. Fold over the ends and roll it up. get the lid of the bottle ready, place the bicarb into the bottle gently. screw the lid on really quickly and tight, give it a shake and run!( it also works great throwing it up in the air and in holes covered with dirt)

lines.text: do not hold the bottle while it explode.
lines.text_raw: do not hold the bottle while it explode.

lines.text: do not hold milk bottle by the handle when shaking( i have had my hand get trapped and exploded on)
lines.text_raw: do not hold milk bottle by the handle when shaking( i have had my hand get trapped and exploded on)

guide.summary: vinegar and bi-carb soda bottle bomb(loud bang)
guide.title: vinager and bicarb bomb
